personal.name: Sheraz Tariq
personal.title: Full-stack Developer & AI/ML Engineer
personal.bio:
Hey ðŸ‘‹
I'm Sheraz, a highly motivated Full-stack Developer and AI/ML Engineer with over a year of professional experience. I specialize in building scalable enterprise CRM solutions, AI-powered applications, and DevOps automation. Passionate about leveraging cutting-edge technologies like RAG, LangChain, and blockchain to create innovative software solutions.

current.institution: FAST - National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences

achievements: Successfully led development of multiple AI and DevOps projects
Improved system efficiency through automation and CI/CD implementation
Built scalable enterprise CRM solutions for high-availability systems
Specialized in AI/ML with focus on RAG, NLP, and Deep Learning

experience.description: Technology company specializing in CRM solutions. Engineered and maintained critical features for enterprise CRM platforms SugarCRM and SuiteCRM, ensuring robust performance and high system availability. Contributed to the software development lifecycle, focusing on building scalable backend logic. Assisted in modernizing deployment workflows, improving development efficiency by participating in quality assurance and integration testing processes.

projects.title: Community Automation System Using Blockchain
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive community automation web application that leverages blockchain technology and AI to streamline community operations. Implemented advanced user interaction features to significantly enhance community engagement and participation. Built decentralized infrastructure for transparent community management.

projects.title: DocChat-MultiAgent
projects.description: A multi-agent RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) system powered by Google Gemini, Docling, and LangGraph for intelligent document Q&A with built-in fact-checking and hallucination prevention.

projects.title: Meal & Grocery Planner with CrewAI
projects.description: A production-ready intelligent meal planning and grocery shopping assistant powered by CrewAI, LangChain, and Google Gemini. This system uses a multi-agent architecture to coordinate specialized AI agents for meal research, shopping organization, budget analysis, and waste reduction.

projects.title: AI Icebreaker Bot
projects.description: Executed the complete RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) workflow from data extraction to intelligent generation. Utilized LangChain and LlamaIndex for efficient processing and retrieval, creating an engaging icebreaker conversation bot. Implemented context-aware responses for natural conversations.

projects.title: Food Recommendation System
projects.description: Developed an intelligent food recommendation system leveraging RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) and vector similarity search. Integrated Google Gemini API to enhance recommendation accuracy and provide personalized food suggestions based on user preferences. Built scalable architecture for real-time recommendations.

projects.title: AI-Nutrition-Coach-via-Multi-Agent
projects.description: Build and deploy a multi-agent system that powers intelligent decision-making. Integrate multimodal AI to handle both visual and textual data. Create a user-friendly interface using Gradio, so your app is accessible to anyone.

projects.title: Youtube-Summarizer
projects.description: In this project, I've build a question-answering (QA) tool capable of extracting and summarizing information from YouTube videos. Leveraging LangChain and a large language model (LLM), the tool will answer specific questions based on a video's transcript.

internship.workStyle: Fast learner, team player, problem solver with hands-on experience in production CRM systems and AI applications
internship.goals: Join an innovative startup or tech company building scalable solutions. I want to contribute to meaningful projects while growing my skills in enterprise-level development, AI/ML systems, and cloud infrastructure.

funFacts: Successfully led multiple AI and DevOps projects improving efficiency
Built enterprise CRM solutions ensuring high system availability
Experienced in complete RAG workflow implementation
Proficient in both frontend and backend development
personality.workingStyle: I focus on building scalable, high-quality solutions with attention to system performance and reliability
personality.motivation: Creating innovative software solutions that solve real-world problems through AI, automation, and modern development practices
